errors.panel_disabled: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** This ticket panel is currently disabled.
errors.blacklisted: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** You are not allowed to create tickets.
errors.no_panel_channel: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Panel channel must be configured for thread mode.
errors.creation_failed: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Failed to create ticket. Please contact server admin.
errors.cooldown: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Please wait {{seconds}} seconds before creating another ticket.
errors.thread_parent_invalid: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Thread parent must be a text channel.
errors.no_thread_permission: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Bot lacks permission to create threads.
